item.title: Camera Control
item.description: Notes on Cameras Cameras are a complicated situation. If you are running the Docker way then FFMPEG will be preinstalled for you with several of the options preset (may not have all hardware accelerations built). Alternately you can download and compile your own version of FFMPEG with the build flags you need for your cameras. For those writing examples, please include how you have installed FFMPEG! It is recommended to add only one camera per bridge.
